review: Great product at a great price
author: Charles S. Probert

review: Plenty of options for TV viewing which will allow me to reduce my Uverse planm
author: John W. Thomas Jr.

review: Had the Fire TV Stick up and running within minutes! Works great. Great price, too.
author: Seashores

review: Works great.  Couldn't ask for more for the price.
author: Veronica

review: Not connected to Xfinity Comcast so I can not connect to my cable registration to view certain apps such as Showtime, HBOGo, Disney and others. So it's a bit disappointing.
author: Judith Gates

review: Fun, easy to use! I'm still exploring, but so far, so good! I like the availability of quality games like bowling and pinball in addition to movies and TV, and the ease with which I can switch between them.
author: JeffL0719

review: This is great! Can't beat the price. Love the compact size. Couldn't get it to work on one TV, but worked on 2 others.
author: New Mom

review: Very happy with the Fire TV stick. Easy to set up, easy menu to maneuver. On line help answered all my questions and more. Love that I can use my smart phone to talk for searches, so much more convenient compared to typing in information. Best buy I made in awhile!
author: K. Palmer "Sage Hen Designs"

review: Will give it 5 stars when they add a favorites bar so I can navigate to all apps like Netflix or plex easily, additionally if you child protect it, you have to enter a 5 digit pin for even free prime video content for every show, not good.  Amazon is close, but my original old Roku, still had a better interface.
author: Karobekian "R. Bodoin"
